thread.section_title: Splendid Etoile Hotel - UPDATED 2016 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Hotel Service and location
thread.title_full: Hotel Service and location - Review of Splendid Etoile Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Alfred Raymund U
title: Hotel Service and location
text:
The hotels sevice is very good....the butler named Farouq was very nice and helpful....the girl in the dining area named Gloria is very accommodating and cheerful...
The location of the hoter is superb....it is in the heart of paris....and you can leave your luggage after you check out and you can still go for shopping if your flight is late in the evening....
Alfred Unilongo
Swords, Dublin
Room Tip: Choose the room in 6th floor...you have a full view of arc de triump from your window... See more room tips
